caption.title: pCAGEN-MAVS had stronger expression level than pEF-Bos-MAVS.
caption.p: HEK293T cells in 24-well plates were transfected with 50 ng pCAGEN-myc-MAVS or pEF-Bos-Flag-MAVS plus 100 ng p125-Luc and 10 ng pRL-TK. After 48 hours, cells were harvested for dual-luciferase reporter assay.
Click here for additional data file.
